Pardanecta Wróblewski, 1962: 177–178
( type species:
Micronecta punctata ( Fieber, 1844 )
, by monotypy).

This is a monotypic subgenus. The type species,
Micronecta punctata ( Fieber, 1844 )
, proved to be a junior homonym of
Sigara punctata Illiger, 1807
. The valid name of the species is thus
Micronecta haliploides Horváth, 1904
(see
Buzzetti et al. 2006
).
